name: Tiny World (itch) (LOKIDYLAN)
description:
A short arcade-style game with RPG elements, venture through the seemingly endless tunnels of the ship you're hitching a ride on, destroy enemy ships, and along the way upgrade your own!

This is my first proper game (so please forgive some jank) I created it for a college assignment, it's free but donations are extremely appreciated!

The game takes around 15 minutes to beat (The story mode at least)

Visit my channel if you're interested in the development :>

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxhym1y-EsaaLgaDRXv0a0Q
